column3: Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
I have signed the contributor license agreement now.
Thank you, but the fix you suggested is a bit tricky, I've fixed the problem in more obvious way (I believe).

the reason i fixed it this way is because there are quite a few edge cases which just get fixed by "resyncing" the state. it would obviously be better to make sure that things are always kept in sync, but that would involve a much bigger change.
All I do basically is ask for what the current window should be and then make sure that what should be the current window actually is focused.
I also tried getting to the bottom of why it ended up in an inconsistent state in the first place but I gave up after about an hour, because I just didn't have the time to chase after this.
In that sense this is rather a Hotfix, that (having run this for a few days now) has been working properly for me.
@lumie1337 thanks for the fix, the original issue has been fixed in master.
